Package com.hissain.jscipy.signal.api

Interface IRK4Solver

All Known Implementing Classes:
RK4Solver
public interface IRK4Solver
IRK4Solver defines the public API for the Runge-Kutta 4th Order (RK4) numerical solver functionality within the jSciPy library.

Implementations of this interface provide methods to solve ordinary differential equations (ODEs) using the RK4 method, offering both fixed-step and specified-time-point integration.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Interface
    Description
    static interface 
    IRK4Solver.DifferentialEquation
    Functional interface for defining the differential equation dy/dt = f(t, y).
    static class 
    IRK4Solver.Solution
    Solution is a static nested class that holds the results of an RK4 integration.

    Solves an ordinary differential equation (ODE) using the RK4 method at specified time points.
    IRK4Solver.Solution
    solve(IRK4Solver.DifferentialEquation f, double y0, double t0, double tf, double h)
    Solves an ordinary differential equation (ODE) using the RK4 method with a fixed step size.

  • Method Details

    • solve

      IRK4Solver.Solution solve(IRK4Solver.DifferentialEquation f, double y0, double t0, double tf, double h)
      Solves an ordinary differential equation (ODE) using the RK4 method with a fixed step size.
      Parameters:
      f - The differential equation dy/dt = f(t, y), provided as a IRK4Solver.DifferentialEquation functional interface.
      y0 - The initial condition for the solution at t0.
      t0 - The initial time.
      tf - The final time. The integration will proceed from t0 up to tf.
      h - The fixed step size for the integration. Must be positive.
      Returns:
      A IRK4Solver.Solution object containing arrays of time points and corresponding solution values.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if h is not positive, or if t0 is greater than tf.
      NullPointerException - if f is null.

    • solve

      IRK4Solver.Solution solve(IRK4Solver.DifferentialEquation f, double y0, double[] tSpan)
      Solves an ordinary differential equation (ODE) using the RK4 method at specified time points. The step size for each interval is determined by the difference between consecutive time points in tSpan.
      Parameters:
      f - The differential equation dy/dt = f(t, y), provided as a IRK4Solver.DifferentialEquation functional interface.
      y0 - The initial condition for the solution at tSpan[0].
      tSpan - An array of time points where the solution is desired. Must be sorted in ascending order. The first element tSpan[0] is the initial time.
      Returns:
      A IRK4Solver.Solution object containing arrays of the provided time points and corresponding solution values.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if tSpan is null, empty, or not sorted in ascending order.
      NullPointerException - if f is null.
